name: Arab Jewel City
description:
Robbers Covet The Wealth of Jewel City For a Long Time
The Desert Heroes Fight Back
Guard the Wealth and Glory of Arab Jewel City

Game Features:
-Special Arabic Style Matching Game
-Great background music and easy to play
-Cool matching effect and combo skill
-Challenge the final level to win treasure box

Download the game now and have fun with your family members or friends.
